医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员利用脂质体开发光控药物输送系统人工脂质双层囊泡脂质体，也称为蛋白脂质体，是能够掺入各种分子（例如化学品和药物）的专门系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Researchers-develop-light-control-drug-delivery-system-using-liposomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Researchers-develop-light-control-drug-delivery-system-using-liposomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ae90449-4552-4330-8611-9bbfeb0868d0 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 07:33:28 -0400 Researchers develop light-controlled drug delivery system using liposomes
研究发现 SARS-CoV-2 mRNA 疫苗接种可诱导鼻粘膜产生免疫反应众所周知，呼吸道病毒能够通过眼睛、鼻子或嘴巴进入人体。我们的身体也知道这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/SARS-CoV-2-mRNA-vaccination-induces-an-immune-response-in-the-nasal-mucosa-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/SARS-CoV-2-mRNA-vaccination-induces-an-immune-response-in-the-nasal-mucosa-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d8a2136-7d08-4bc5-83f1-b07246a1a872 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 07:18:10 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 mRNA vaccination induces an immune response in the nasal mucosa, study finds
研究分析了 COVID-19 期间英国金钱与心理健康之间的关系阿斯顿大学个人财务健康中心发布了一份报告，概述了由货币和养老金服务局（MaPS）资助的一项关于英国金钱与心理健康之间关系的快速证据审查的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-analyzes-the-relationship- Between-money-and-mental-health-in-the-UK-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-analyzes-the-relationship- Between-money-and-mental-health-in-the-UK-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09979601-309f-4782-a320-dbb9b51361f4 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 07:06:42 -0400 Study analyzes the relationship between money and mental health in the UK during COVID-19
威胁上升：年轻人心血管疾病发病率上升研究估计了心血管疾病的发病率、患病率、死亡率和伤残调整生命年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Rising-threat-cardioangio-disease-on-the-rise-among-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Rising-threat-cardioangio-disease-on-the-rise-among-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3dcf7a7-e5f3-42ba-9618-e732778f3a22 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 05:51:00 -0400 Rising threat: cardiovascular disease on the rise among young adults
生存秘诀：地中海饮食和乳腺癌结果研究分析了总体死亡率和 BC 特异性死亡率是否与 MD 依从性相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/A-recipe-for-survival-Mediterranean-diet-and-breast-cancer-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/A-recipe-for-survival-Mediterranean-diet-and-breast-cancer-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0290b192-05d6-409e-a800-ebb31390956a Wed, 28 Jun 2023 05:23:00 -0400 A recipe for survival: Mediterranean diet and breast cancer outcomes
法国猫体内发现高致病性甲型H5N1禽流感病毒，引发公众健康担忧研究描述了在家猫体内鉴定出高致病性甲型禽流感病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Public-health-concerns-as-highly-pathogenic-avian-influenza-A(H5N1)-virus-found-in-cat-in-France.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Public-health-concerns-as-highly-pathogenic-avian-influenza-A(H5N1)-virus-found-in-cat-in-France.aspx ＃评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d129c6f9-3a43-4250-a74e-708f91260c3e Wed, 28 Jun 2023 04:36:00 -0400 Public health concerns as highly pathogenic avian influenza A(H5N1) virus found in cat in France
降血压药物可以更广泛地用于预防偏头痛关于所有类别的血压 (BP) 药物在预防偏头痛方面的积极作用的国际研究的首次已知大规模审查表明，这些广泛使用的药物可以比目前的做法更广泛、更低成本地使用，根据今天发表在《头痛》杂志上的一篇新论文。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Blood-Pressure-lowering-medications-could-be-used-more-widely-to-prevent-migraines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Blood-Pressure-lowering-medications-could-be-used-more-widely-to-prevent-migraines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac6a7448-0a29-4f41-a359-713bb5dcd9a0 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 23:54:00 -0400 Blood pressure lowering medications could be used more widely to prevent migraines
研究探讨了非洲裔人群子宫内膜癌的发病率和趋势与白人女性相比，黑人女性被诊断患有晚期子宫癌（也称为子宫内膜癌）和发展为侵袭性肿瘤的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Study-explores-the-incidence-and-trends-for-endometrial-cancer-among-African-descent-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Study-explores-the-incidence-and-trends-for-endometrial-cancer-among-African-descent-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ed19eef-d767-4c04-a520-6040f750f500 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 23:48:00 -0400 Study explores the incidence and trends for endometrial cancer among African descent populations
高于推荐剂量的维生素 D 可降低心房颤动的风险东芬兰大学的一项新研究表明，连续五年服用高于推荐剂量的维生素 D 可以降低老年男性和女性患房颤的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Higher-than-recommended-doses-of-vitamin-D-linked-to-lower-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Higher-than-recommended-doses-of-vitamin-D-linked-to-lower-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4deb72ee-8844-447e-b98c-e749f349b0c2 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 23:43:00 -0400 Higher-than-recommended doses of vitamin D linked to lower risk of atrial fibrillation
聊天机器人干预可有效改善身体活动、饮食和睡眠研究发现，聊天机器人干预可以有效改善身体活动、饮食和睡眠。该研究强调了聊天机器人在不同人群和年龄组中的功效，强调了它们在个性化医疗服务方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Chatbot-interventions- effective-in-improving-physical-activity-diet-and-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Chatbot-interventions- effective-in-improving-physical-activity-diet-and-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ec4605f-c755-465d-becc-e513ae5b1c5c Tue, 27 Jun 2023 23:26:00 -0400 Chatbot interventions effective in improving physical activity, diet, and sleep
